title: Manic Panic Pillarbox Red 4oz
description: Manic Panic presents semi-permanent hair dye, with a longer-lasting color! For best results, pre-lighten hair. Use latex gloves. Made in the USA.

title: Garnier Fructis Leave-In Anti-Frizz Serum for for fizzy, dry and unmanageable hair, Sleek & Shine, 5.1 Fluid Ounce
description: A conditioning leave-in serum for fizzy, dry and unmanageable hair

title: ECOCO Eco Style Gel, Blue, 32 Ounce
description: Eco eco styler styling gel for color treated hair is a medium hold styling gel especially formulated for color treated hair. It will not effect the color of your hair and will not flake. It can be safely used to add volume and sheen. This styling gel is ideal for achieving the desired style with soft hold hair styles.

title: Midnight Fantasy By Britney Spears for Women, Eau De Parfum Spray, 3.4 Ounce
description: Launched by the design house of Britney Spears.When applying any fragrance please consider that there are several factors which can affect the natural smell of your skin and, in turn, the way a scent smells on you.  For instance, your mood, stress level, age, body chemistry, diet, and current medications may all alter the scents you wear.  Similarly, factor such as dry or oily skin can even affect the amount of time a fragrance will last after being applied

title: Escada Magnetism By Escada For Women. Eau De Parfum Spray 2.5 Ounces
description: Introduced in 2003. Fragrance notes: green and  fresh fruits and leaves, with a touch of musk and patchouli. Recommended use: casual.When applying any fragrance please consider that there are several factors which can affect the natural smell of your skin and, in turn, the way a scent smells on you.  For instance, your mood, stress level, age, body chemistry, diet, and current medications may all alter the scents you wear.  Similarly, factor such as dry or oily skin can even affect the amount of time a fragrance will last after being applied

title: Paris Hilton Heiress Women Eau De Parfum Spray, 1 Ounce
description: Paris Hilton Heiress By Paris Hilton Eau De Parfum Spray 1 Oz For Women : It has top notes of passion fruit, orange, peach granita, and champagne mimosa. With middle notes consisting of star jasmine, tiare flower, ylang-ylang, honeysuckle, dewberry blossom, and grenadine. Then base notes of violet leaf, vetiver, tonka, and blonde woods.

title: Aphogee Two-step Treatment Protein for Damaged Hair 16 oz.
description: This unique treatment is formulated with magnesium and modified proteins which fuse into the hair with the application of heat.  The result is that breakage is drastically reduced.  ApHogee Two-Step Protein Treatment is a salon service product unlike any product available for at-home use.  During the process, ApHogee treatment hardens into the hair, dramatic evidence that something special is occurring. For best results a hooded dryer is required. After rinsing and moisturizing with ApHogee Balancing Moisturizer, clients are astounded with the results.  ApHogee Two-Step Protein Treatment can help improve other salon services as well.  This remedial process is highly recommended for hair that:     Is too weak or fine to take a perm or relaxer. (use the week PRIOR to service)  Is over-bleached.  Will not hold color. (use PRIOR to color application)  Breaks when combed or brushed.  Is mushy when wet and brittle after drying.  1oz (twin pak with Balancing Moisturizer) single size, 4 oz stylist size, 16 oz salon size  Stops hair breakage, rebuilds hair structure for six weeks. This unique Treatment is formulated with specially modified proteins and magnesium, which fuse into the hair when you apply heat. The result is that breakage in all hair types is drastically reduced. ApHOGEE Treatment is a salon service product unlike any product available for at-home use. During the process, ApHOGEE Treatment hardens into the hair, revealing dramatic evidence that something special is happening. After rinsing, and moisturizing, clients are astounded with the results. ApHOGEE Treatment can help improve other salon services as well. It is highly recommended for hair that:  is too weak or fine to take a perm  is over-bleached  will not hold color  breaks when combed or brushed  is mushy when wet and brittle

title: Remington S5500 Digital Anti Static 1 Inch Ceramic Hair Straightener
description: Say goodbye to frizz and fly-aways while boosting style control with remingtons s-5500 one inch digital heat ceramic flat iron. infused anti-static technology reduces the amount of negatively charged particles during styling and allows for 50% more static control. the thirty second instant heat up will reach the salon high heat temperature of 410 degrees fahrenheit. one hour automatic shut off, 2 limited year warranty, and floating plates.

title: Silk Elements MegaSilk Heat Protection Spray
description:
BRAND NEW, Silk Elements MegaSilk Heat Protection Spray

NET WT 8 OZ.

Nourishes hair 

Provides an intense smoothing 

Gives a long-lasting frizz finish,

 Transforms hair into a salon-smooth style 

Leaves hair soft and silky 

Provides a luxurious shine 

Can be used with flat iron, blow dryer or any heated appliance 


Designed specifically for use with heated styling tools, such as curling and straightening irons, Silk Elements MegaSilk Heat Protection Spray protects the hair from damage caused by heated appliances. Leaves hair soft and silky while providing a luxurious shine.

title: Organic Root Stimulator Olive Oil Moisturizing Hair Lotion
description: Organic Root Stimulator Olive Oil Moisturizing Hair Lotion restores hair's natural moisture balance.

title: HSI PROFESSIONAL 1 CERAMIC TOURMALINE IONIC FLAT IRON HAIR STRAIGHTENER FREE GLOVE + POUCH AND travel size Argan Oil Leave In Hair Treatment. WORLDWIDE DUAL VOLTAGE 110v-220v
description: The Proffesional HSI Flat Iron is great for transforming frizzy, dull hair into gorgeously straight, sleek locks. Aside from straightening, the Proffesional HSI Flat Iron curls and flips hair beautifully, its 1" plates giving maximum control for all hair types. With flash quick heating and swivel cord, this iron provides great style without making a mess or taking too much time. Featuring new easier grip with ergonomic design for easier hold, the styler flat iron also has versatile heat settings to provide you with total control for all your hairstyling needs. Moist ceramic heat with solid ceramic plates and coils will maintain even temperature

title: Maybelline New York Instant Age Rewind Primer Skin Transformer, Clear, 0.85 Fluid Ounce
description: Instantly create a perfectly smooth canvas for ideal makeup application with instant age rewind primer skin transformer. Lines, wrinkles, pores and imperfections appear to instantly vanish in just one step. Enhances skin's radiance. Subtle pink tint for a youthful glow

title: Creme of Nature with Argan Oil Style & Shine Foaming Mousse
description: Creme of Nature with Argan Oil Style & Shine Foaming Mousse is a uniquely formulated mousse that is perfect for styling natural and relaxed hair.

title: OPI Nail Lacquer Muppets Collection, Gettin' Miss Piggy With It, 0.5 Fluid Ounce
description: OPI captures the fabulous color of the Disney release of the muppets in OPI 2011 limited edition holiday collection. It comes in a red glitter shade. It is packed with micas and sparkle for a 3D textured look. Exclusive OPI provide brush for the ultimate application. Does not contain DBP, toluene or formaldehyde.

title: Super Nail 16 oz. Pure Acetone
description: Super Nail Pure Acetone is multi-purpose 100% pure acetone polish remover that can be used to remove artificial nails, wraps, gel, and acrylic compounds.

title: Dudu Osun Black Soap, 6-Count, 150g
description: Includes 6 pieces of Dudu Osun Soap in each pack.

title: Essie Mirror Metallic Collection Summer 2012, Blue Rhapsody
description: A jazzy blue metallic.

title: Burt's Bees - Cuticle Creme Lemon Butter - 0.6 oz.
description: Burt's Bees Lemon Butter Cuticle Cream.0.60 oz / 17 g.

title: OPI Rapidry Top Nail Coats, 4 Fluid Ounce
description: Mist on RapiDry Nail Polish Dryer 45 seconds after applying final coat of nail polish.

title: Gena Hoof Lacquer, 5 Ounce
description: Pamper your hands and feet with Hoof Lacquer from Gena. Beauty begins with professional quality hand and body treatments that soften and soothe or polish and perfect. Try it today for healthy and renewed skin and nails.

title: Nailtek Intensive Therapy-2 Treatment for Soft Peeling Nails, 0.5 Fluid Ounce
description: Nailtek intensive therapy improves weak, thin, soft, or peeling nails. This unique protein formulation seals the layers of the nail together. With each application, it reinforces and thickens nails while promoting strength and flexibility.

title: Sally Hansen Triple Strong Advanced Gel Nail Hardener-0.45 oz
description: Sally Hansen triple strong is a breakthrough gel formula that strengthens and protects nails. 3-in-1 protection. Formula with: epoxy polymer reinforces as it adds flexibility; protects against breaking, peeling, and splitting. Calcium complex with pro-vitamin b5 and iron helps strengthen to help natural nails grow longer and stronger. Titanium helps mend and bond weak, fragile nails. Instantly, nails become harder and more durable. Triple strong's quick,-drying, high-shine gel suspension protects nails as they grow longer, stronger and healthy.
